==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=4|rs=人11}}

====Readings====
* {{ja-readings|on=[[どう]] (dō)|kun=[[はたらく]] (hataraku), [[はたらき]] (hataraki)}}

====Usage notes====
This [[kanji]] is a [[kokuji]] ([[国字]]), derived from the Chinese equivalent [[動]]. Note that while many kokuji have only a ''kun'' reading, this character also has the ''on'' reading ''dō,'' from the ''on'' reading of the phonetic 動.
